dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset containing 56880 RGB+D video samples executed by 40 different human subjects, with various modalities including RGB videos, depth sequences, skeleton data, and infrared frames.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D (NTU) dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Zhang
W. Li
P. Wang
P. Ogunbona
S. Liu
C. Tang
dcterms:description: An integrated dataset created by combining nine existing public datasets, containing 4953 video sequences with RGB and depth information across 94 action classes performed by 107 subjects.
dcterms:title: Large Scale Combined (LSC) dataset

dcterms:creator: V. Kalofolias
X. Bresson
M. Bronstein
P. Vandergheynst
dcterms:description: A dataset frequently used in matrix completion tasks, representing user-item interactions where the matrix is generated under certain assumptions like low rank property.
dcterms:title: Synthetic ‘Netﬂix’ dataset
